properties.Name: CustomerFinanceTerm
properties.Description:
The Finance Term(s) that may be extended to the associated Customer for the indicated purchase/transaction amounts for the indicated period. 

Ex:
Customer purchases of $500-1,000 are offered the following Finance Term(s) for the indicated period.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: FinanceTermId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Finance Term.

Columns.Name: MinimumTransactionAmount
Columns.Description: The minimum transaction amount in the associated transaction range for which the associated Finance Term(s) are acceptable or applicable.

Columns.Name: MaximumTransactionAmount
Columns.Description: The maximum transaction amount in the associated transaction range for which the associated Finance Term(s) are acceptable or applicable.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the associated customer finance term is offered.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the associated customer finance term is offered.

Columns.Name: CustomerFinanceTermNote
Columns.Description: Notes, comments or additional information regarding the Customer Finance Term.

Properties.Description:
The Finance Term(s) that may be extended to the associated Customer for the indicated purchase/transaction amounts for the indicated period. 

Ex:
Customer purchases of $500-1,000 are offered the following Finance Term(s) for the indicated period.
